title: PICS: Bonang stuns in wedding gown as she hosts Equanimity Awards in Texas
text:
PICS: Bonang stuns in wedding gown as she hosts Equanimity Awards in Texas share this

Johannesburg – Bonang looked like a dream in white when she hosted the 4th annual Equanimity Awards Gala in Texas on Saturday.

The annual charity gala is aimed at honouring individuals and organisations who are working to make positive changes in their communities.

Bonang, who recently announced the end of her successful reality show Being Bonang, left social media users in awe when she shared pictures of herself in a white gown with feather detail which she wore on the night.

The dress was made by US designer Stephen Goudea and is part of his Wedding Couture collection.

Flooding the star's comments section with compliments were the likes of Lalla Hirayama, Nandi Madida and Jessica Nkosi.

SEE THE GOWN HERE:
description: The TV personality left social media users in awe when she shared pictures of herself in the white gown with feather detail.
